<h1>Hide Flag</h1>

- 0b: mã nhị phân
- o : mã octal
- 0x: mã hex

```python
cipher = [0b1001000,0o0151,0o041,0b100000,0b1010111,0o0145,0b110110,0o0143,0x6f,0x6d,0b1100101,0x20,0b1110100,0b1101111,0o040,0b101011,0o0151,0b1100010,0x6c,0o0157,0o04,0o0103,0o0124,0b1000110,0b101110,0b100000,0x54,0b110100,0o0151,0b1110011,0x20,0x69,0o0163,0o040,0b1110100,0b110100,0o0145,0x20,0b1100110,0b1101001,0b1110010,0x73,0b1110100,0x20,0x74,0o0151,0o0155,0o0145,0b100000,0b1010110,0x69,0x62,0b1101100,0b1101111,0x20,0b1000011,0b1010100,0b100011,0o040,0b1101000,0b1100001,0x73,0o040,0b1100010,0b1100101,0o0145,0x6e,0o040,0o0150,0b1100101,0b1101100,0x64,0x2e,0o040,0b1011001,0o0157,0o0165,0b100000,0b1100001,0x72,0x65,0x20,0x6c,0b1101111,0b1101111,0o0153,0o0151,0x6e,0o0147,0x20,0b1100110,0b1101111,0o0162,0x20,0x73,0b1101111,0b1101101,0o0145,0b1110100,0b1101000,0b1101001,0b1101110,0b1100111,0o077,0o040,0b1010100,0b1101000,0b1101001,0b1110011,0o040,0b1101001,0b1110011,0b100000,0x61,0x20,0x77,0o0145,0o0154,0b110110,0o055,0b1100100,0x65,0b1110011,0x65,0x72,0o0166,0o0145,0o0144,0o040,0x61,0b1110111,0b1100001,0b1110010,0x64,0x2,0o0146,0o0157,0b1110010,0b100000,0b1111001,0o0157,0x75,0x20,0b1000110,0b1101100,0b1100001,0b1100111,0o0173,0b1101001,0x5f,0x57,0b1101001,0b1110011,0x23,0b1011111,0x41,0o061,0b110001,0o0137,0o0164,0x34,0b1110011,0x6b,0b110101,0o0137,0x57,0x33,0o0162,0b110011,0b1011111,0o061,0b1101000,0o0151,0o065,0b1011111,0o063,0b110100,0b110101,0b1111001,0x5f,0b1111000,0b1000100,0o0104,0o0175,0b101110,0b100000,0b100100,0o0141,0x76,0b1100101,0o04,0o0141,0x20,0b1100111,0x6f,0x6f,0x64,0b10000,0o0164,0o0151,0o0155,0b1100101,0b100000,0b1100001,0b111010,0o04,0o0126,0b1101001,0b110001,0o0154,0b1101111,0x20,0b1000011,0o0124,0b1000110,0b101110,0x20,0b1000011,0b1101000,0x65,0o0145,0b1110010,0b1110011,0b100001]
print("".join([chr(x) for x in cipher]))
```

>Flag: Flag{i_Wis#_A11_t4sk5_W3r3_1hi5_345y_xDD}
